title: Rs 79,000 crore of GST dues to states pending for FY22: Finance Ministry - Business Standard
content:
1. Rs 79,000 crore of GST dues to states pending for FY22: Finance Ministry  Business Standard
  2. GST compensation for 8 months released to states, Rs 78,704 cr pending: Finance Ministry  Economic Times
  3. Gst Compensation Of Rs7.35 Trillion Paid To States So Far: Finance Ministry  Mint
  4. Finance Minister 'embarrassed' PM by putting out GST dues on day he admonished states: Chidambaram  The New Indian Express
  5. What Some States Plan To Do After GST Compensation Cess Period Ends  BloombergQuint
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: It added that all dues had been paid for FY21. So far, it has released Rs 7.35 trillion to States, including the assistance released on a back-to-back basis
